headers.value: default-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.live; font-src 'self' data: fonts.gstatic.com fonts.googleapis.com *.vercel.app vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com *.vercel.app; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app api.knock.app wss://api.knock.app; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.vercel.app
